name: adc_ltm_datagroup_list
scriptContent:
from appviewx import db_connection
connect_db = db_connection()

def getLTMDataGroupList():
    '''
    to get the list of LTM data group

    '''

    ltm_group_list = []
    adc_ltm_group_list = connect_db.appviewx.lc.find()
    for device in adc_ltm_group_list:
        ltm_group_list.append(device)
    return ltm_group_list
description: To get a list of LTM datagroup
_keywords: To get a list of LTM datagroup
